extendedInfo.description: EchoHacks Speech Trainer enables the user to speak into the microphone andto hear back the user's own voice through headphones after a specific delay in seconds. The voice is echoed back automatically, while standard audio recorderswould require multiple button clicks to duplicate this process.The tool has a wide range of applications and can be used effectively in training for accent reduction, foreign language pronunciation, diction, articulation,singing, public speaking, and interview practice.Please visit the EchoHacks website to learn how to use the tool effectively for your speech training.EchoHacks Speech Trainer was created by the inventor who wanted to reduce his foreign accent, and improve his public speaking skills. He developed the appafter realizing that no tools were available that would assist him to focus on deliberate practice (focused high repetition drills) in speech training.IMPORTANT:* The app will only function with a phone headset.* The app is a speech training tool and does not record audio.* The app will run in the background.If you encounter any problems, please leave a message on the website forums(www.echohacks.com/forums) and we will do our very best to help you.Application:speech, speech training, accent, accent training, pronunciation, articulation, speech,foreign language, public speaking

reviews.comment: Well I downloaded this app and guess what? It does nothing! Doesn\'t work at all now how wonderful is that so thrilled!
reviews.author: Rick E

reviews.title: interesting concept
reviews.comment: This is essentially a delayed auditory feedback device- first time I see this application for general language training. I have used this app for two months, and it is outstanding for listening to my own voice for speech feedback ... should be helpful for presenters who need to listen to themselves.  The ability to fix the delay is a great advantage as I can control the audio length for specific conversational drills. I use it together with the other Speech Trainer app on the market that uses a different strategy-.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Background mode!
reviews.comment: Very useful in practicing languages while watching video clips-no other app does this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: not that novel
reviews.comment: Quite inferior to the original android Speech Trainer app which offers full functionality for free (GPL license). Speech Trainer does not have a fixed delay, but auto detects when to start playback. It also can be used without headphones.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Nice idea and only one this type of app , it works perfectally on my HTC Desire HD.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: promising app
reviews.comment: The app is very simple to use and simplifies listening to my own voice. The 8 seconds limitation seems restricting though.
